info.name: Kongregate+ 2015 [AV]
info.description:
A small CSS script that makes browing on the "Kong Forums" way more pleasant. 
Please send bug reports to loner_dude@hotmail.com
info.additionalInfo:
AV - Alternative Version [NEWEST]

v.1.2.05
- Smooth / Sleek design, removed table borders making pages more fluid,
- Arial text included, text sized at 95% for more condensed posts,
- Slight Red color scheme. Quotes / Elements are slightly blue, to give some contrast,
- Improved userbar is supported! (launched 02-18-15, the one without the progress bar),
- OP names have been colored, padding added for future round avatar support,
- Removed automatic capitals on thread titles / usernames / other text,
- Added (dotted) top-border back in so the separation effect is retained.
- Few other small tweaks to colors, interaction and transitions
- Userprofiles added!
- Fixed bugs on text, capitalisation and uppercasings of elements
- Made forum text within the userbox (with username / avatar) slightly darker on request

Previous release:
https://userstyles.org/styles/110576/kongregate-2015
